Information_2_1: ^Sten is dead? Oh no... that's terrible.
^Where were you the last few hours?
^That's all I need to know for now.

c-0: ^Oh... I've been working. Just tending to my cattle.
^Right. Can anyone account for your whereabouts?
^Yes! I'm sure Ulf and Yrsa must have seen me working! I saw them.
^You saw them working on their farm?
^I did! I saw them tending to their flowers at their home.

c-1: ^Oh you remember that? I only thought that his preaching was... unnecessary.
^Okay. So you didn't agree with him?

c-0: ^Yes. That was all. Talk of the spirits can make people nervous.
